TopicTitle: International Day of Human Space Flight

Articles.Content: Is that day when we get 1.0? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Umm... probably not. They haven't gotten to Experimentals yet, so it's unlikely they'll have a release for us within two weeks from now.
Anyone who knows the planned release date for 1.0 isn't talking about it, and asking for the release date is against the rules. Locking.
